page.title: 08TREDINGTON SCHOOL
page.content: { Jane Derrick is a pupil}at Tredington Primary School. She lives in Uckington which is two and a half miles away from the school. It takes Jane quarter of an hour to get to her school. At {playtime}she plays British Bull Dogs and Drain Tag. Drain Tag is a game where you have to run from drain to drain without anybody tagging you. Janes hobby is collecting badges. Her favourite meal is sausage, beans and chips. Her worst meal is mince meat. Jane attends one after{school club}and she also joins in on the atheletics. She does not play a musical instrument but plays percussion. Jane has two dogs called Richy and Tammy, and two cats called Little-one and Sooty. At school there are 24 children in her class, 16 boys and 8 girls. She writes in both pen and pencil.
